talksYaml.title: Run-JS: A New Library for Running JavaScript Modules in Python
talksYaml.description: run-js is a new Python package that enables users to easily run JavaScript modules in Python without breaking from the familiar Pythonic syntax. With inspiration from sh, it wraps the module instance intercepting requests. This talk will go over cool examples on how to use run-js and also dive into its internals, explain sys.modules, dunder methods, and how to pipe data between JS and Python processes.
